author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Pci-Suntek Technology says dividend payment date on April 20
text:
April 16(Reuters) - Pci-Suntek Technology Co Ltd
* Says it will pay cash dividend of 0.031 yuan per share (before tax) for FY 2017 to shareholders of record on April 19
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 20 and the dividend will be paid on April 20
